title: Riot Girl Tristana cannon bug.
body: After you have moved, {{champion:18}}'s cannon goes up to her body. 2 seconds later it goes back to normal. After I recorded it, I found out that also her Ctrl + 1/2/3/4 also has bugs.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix!
